title: SUMMIT Code and Artifacts Released
content: [Code and artifacts](https://github.com/oss-u/IssueAnalysis) for our work [*SUMMIT: Scaffolding Open Source Software Issue Discussion through Summarization*](https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.02780) are now available.

title: Human-Centered AI Reading Group
content: I help organize the Human-Centered AI Reading Group at Mila. Please send me a message if you'd like to present!
